title: Identifying Traits of the Function
text: The coefficient is $$-1$$ (negative) and the exponent of the power function is 3( an odd number)

title: Behavior of the Function as $$x$$ approaches infinity
text: As $$x$$ approaches $$\infty$$, the output (value of f(x)) decreases without bound
